Name: Nix: Ashes of the Phoenix
About the game: *Please note this game is still in early access - new content every week!* Nix was a warrior trained in the ancient Taoist arts. She had journeyed far and wide in a world filled with darkness and chaos. Her path was one of danger, for hordes of twisted and corrupted enemies roamed the land, eager to take her down. Armed with powerful spells and her trusty ally, Nix is ready to take them on! Features Powerful spells Mythological allies Hordes of enemies Dozens of powerful buffs Collect gold to become even more powerful Level up and unleash ungodly destruction Fight unique bosses Join us on Discord!
